CustomField.formula: CASE(RecordTypeId, "01214000000AX7T",LPAD(TEXT(MONTH(Date_of_Event__c )), 2,"0")&"-"& LPAD(TEXT(DAY(Date_of_Event__c)), 2,"0")&" "&HYPERLINK("/"&Event_Name__r.Id , Event_Name__r.Name), "01214000000AX7O",LPAD(TEXT(MONTH(Date_of_Event__c )), 2,"0")&"-"& LPAD(TEXT(DAY(Date_of_Event__c)), 2,"0")&" "&HYPERLINK("/"&Partner_Event__r.Id, Partner_Event__r.Name), NULL )
CustomField.label: Date and Name Link
